Articles.Content:
Dear @hraban, Falcon 9 (Falke X) vacuum engine is not loading:
  

[LOG 05:05:27.356] PartLoader: Compiling Part 'Contares/Parts/SpaceC/RK-1-M1DV/RK-1-M1DV'
[ERR 05:05:27.358] PartLoader: Encountered exception during compilation. System.FormatException: Unknown char: .
  at System.Double.Parse (System.String s, NumberStyles style, IFormatProvider provider) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at System.Single.Parse (System.String s) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at PartLoader.ParsePart (.UrlConfig urlConfig, .ConfigNode node) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
  at PartLoader+<CompileParts>c__Iterator62.MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

[ERR 05:05:27.361] PartCompiler: Cannot compile part

R2 download for US4plus

- Correction of real plume positions and size
- Resolves the weight problem of first stage
- Fixes (hopefully) the problem @Drakenex

US4plus R2

7 hours ago, hraban said:
 

R2 download for US4plus

- Correction of real plume positions and size
- Resolves the weight problem of first stage
- Fixes (hopefully) the problem @Drakenex

US4plus R2

 

Edit!!

 

My bad, I've updated the mu only, the problem was on the CFG, it loads now! thanks a lot.

 

 

 

Edited May 25, 2017 by Drakenex

@Drakenex

Please remove the patriotic ham slice from my contribution. This area is for Kerbals! Finally, I do not pave everything in black, red and gold.

4 hours ago, hraban said:

@Drakenex

Please remove the patriotic ham slice from my contribution. This area is for Kerbals! Finally, I do not pave everything in black, red and gold.

Why not?

 

FREIHEIT FALKE!!

47 minutes ago, Drakenex said:

Why not?

FREIHEIT FALKE!!

1 minute ago, hraban said:

facepalm!

 

Relax!! that repaint was for personal use and besides is like the real rockets looks

back on topic, the rocket performs excellent, even the booster landing maneuver worked perfect on the first try! Please keep coming that good work!

Hi there @hraban only recently got into this mod (I used the expansion for tantares a while ago) and really like what you've done with it :). Quick question for you, is there any reason why you chose 50% as your scale? Also on a related note I'm working on changing the parts to 64% scale (to the nearest reference diameter) for my own personal use so that it plays nicely with BDB and tantares. When I'm done with it, would you be interested if I posted for others to use?  As I said I'm doing just for my own install at the moment, but if people are interested I'd post it with your permission. 

Anyway, keep up the fantastic work!

2 hours ago, Chimer4 said:

Hi there @hraban only recently got into this mod (I used the expansion for tantares a while ago) and really like what you've done with it :). Quick question for you, is there any reason why you chose 50% as your scale? Also on a related note I'm working on changing the parts to 64% scale (to the nearest reference diameter) for my own personal use so that it plays nicely with BDB and tantares. When I'm done with it, would you be interested if I posted for others to use?  As I said I'm doing just for my own install at the moment, but if people are interested I'd post it with your permission. 

Anyway, keep up the fantastic work!

@Chimer4

Hello and thank you!

The decision to create all Soviet, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese, European, Chinese and Indian (oh sorry forgot the USA) rocket components on a 50% scale is based on the fact that the diameters specified by SQUAD can be reproduced completely with only 3 new standard sizes. The selected scale fits the cuddly appearance of the little kerbals. A reproduction on a scale of 64% is not possible without the creation of even more diametrical diameters.
Beale (Tantares) could not penetrate a uniform scale a year ago and so I distanced myself from his project.

Convert Contares to any scale for your personal use. On a complete conversion of the Contares mod to a different scale, i'm not interested and do not give permission for this. Would it be in my interest i would have done it.

Contares is made for Kerbals. Similarities with real parts are exclusively leanings with a serious background and an adaptation to the physical properties of the Kerbal universe.

Edited May 28, 2017 by hraban

Hraban, 

Love your mod. One question/issue I'm having is that the included antennas don't seem to be connected to my RT network? Am I missing something or is this mod not RT compatible (not a big deal if it isn't, I can just use different antennas).

Thanks!

22 minutes ago, fwdixon said:

Hraban, 

Love your mod. One question/issue I'm having is that the included antennas don't seem to be connected to my RT network? Am I missing something or is this mod not RT compatible (not a big deal if it isn't, I can just use different antennas).

Thanks!

 

The RT settings of Contares antennas was outdated since 1.2.0 is released. If you want to create a MM patch for Contares antennas i will implement it with the next release.

7 hours ago, hraban said:

The RT settings of Contares antennas was outdated since 1.2.0 is released. If you want to create a MM patch for Contares antennas i will implement it with the next release.

Think I got the patch figured out. I'm going to test it on my install first. How do you want me to send it to you once I know it works?

14 hours ago, fwdixon said:

Think I got the patch figured out. I'm going to test it on my install first. How do you want me to send it to you once I know it works?

Post the MM-Patch file as quote here.

//Omni Antennas
//DIPOLE aero
@PART[C_DIPOL_A]:NEEDS[RemoteTech]
{
	!MODULE[ModuleDataTransmitter] {}

	@MODULE[ModuleAnimateGeneric]
	{
		%allowManualControl = false
	}
	
	%MODULE[ModuleRTAntenna] 
	{
		%Mode0OmniRange = 0
		%Mode1OmniRange = 500000
		%EnergyCost = 2.0
		%MaxQ = 4000
		%DeployFxModules = 0
		
		%TRANSMITTER 
		{
			%PacketInterval = 0.5
			%PacketSize = 1
			%PacketResourceCost = 1.0
		}
	}
	
	%MODULE[ModuleSPUPassive] {}
}

@fwdixon

Thank you for the work! I will release the MM-Patch with the next release. The old CONTARES_RT2.cfg will be removed.

From workbench: Really no beauty and not half as practical as expected, the KAPPA-4

Edited June 1, 2017 by hraban
From workbench: Globus-5

What size did you end up with them at?

And wow, aren't you going to run out of launchers soon? What will you do then?

15 minutes ago, CobaltWolf said:

What size did you end up with them at?

And wow, aren't you going to run out of launchers soon? What will you do then?

Globus-5 has Ø 1.875m at the core tank and Ø 1.5m at the engine.

According to Falke-X and Kappa-4, it still needs the Globus-5 to get all four modern transport systems into the orbit.
Contares has 20 carrier rockets and at least 50 variants, excluding various boosters, on the ToDo list. Possible American patterns are not even considered. This should provide enough fun for the next 2 years.

43 minutes ago, hraban said:

Contares has 20 carrier rockets and at least 50 variants, excluding various boosters, on the ToDo list. Possible American patterns are not even considered. This should provide enough fun for the next 2 years.

Can we see this list?

1 minute ago, NeoFatalis said:

Can we see this list?

Where is the surprise?

- Danish Spica
- Tsiklon 2
- Tsiklon 3
- Cyclon 4
- Mayak M
- LIN -Taimyr as OTRAG successor
- CZ-2F finetuned
- CZ-9
- KSRO ULV/HLV
- NASDA H-I
- ESA Adeline
- Europa III
and more
